preface.title: Foreword: ${project.version}
preface.para: We've had some great feedback so far, please keep it coming. Your feedback is greatly appreciated, send it to book@sonatype.com. To keep yourself informed of updates, read the Sonatype blog at: http://www.sonatype.com/people. Everyone at Sonatype has had a hand in this version of the book, so the author is officially "Sonatype".
Please report any bugs or issues on this book's GetSatisfaction page, here: http://www.getsatisfaction.com/sonatype/products/sonatype_maven_by_example.

section.title: Changes in Edition 0.5.2
section.para: The following changes were made in 0.5.2:

listitem.para: Fixed example download link. (MVNEX-123)
Fixed a minor typo in . "one which that" -> "one using". (MVNEX-108)
Implemented some minor reordering issues in to make sure that the WeatherService example is referenced before it is listed. (MVNEX-89)
Added a clarifying sentence to the end of to make it clear that the package phase comes before the install phase and that running mvn install will have the same effect.
Fixed an incorrect email address in . (MVNEX-128)
Fixed an incorrect Sonatype Blog URL in . (MVNEX-127)
Standardized the capitalization of all figure and example titles throughout the book. (MVNEX-26)
Updated Sonatype address on cover. (MVNEX-125)
Updated trademarks (Sun -> Oracle). (MVNEX-126)
Updated PDF Cover to reference Maven 3. (MVNEX-129)
Updated ePub Cover to reference Maven 3. (MVNEX-124)
Andreas Grunewald for reporting various issues and typos throughout the book.
Ion Iovu for identifying typos in the book.
John Yeary for catching hard to find cross referencing issues and various other issues.
Grant Birchmeier for catching capitalization errors throughout the book.

section.title: Changes in Edition 0.5.1
section.para: The following changes were made in 0.5.1:

listitem.para: Various changes to the book website to present sidebar content. (MVNEX-121 and MVNEX-122)

section.title: Changes in Edition 0.5
section.para: The following changes were made in 0.5:

listitem.para: A typo was fixed in . JAR file incorrectly listed as classwords-1.1.jar -> classworlds-1.1.jar. (MVNEX-116)
Fixed a problem with a missing example which was leading to a dangling reference. (MVNEX-115)
Fixed a number of naming problems in . The "simple-webapp" project was repeatedly referred to as the "simple-web" project. (MVNEX-114)
Changed the number of the simple Maven Archetype when calling generate to #77 in . Also added a note in the event that the archetype number changes. (MVNEX-113)
Fixed a subtle, yet frustrating font problem in . A sentence was causing confusion because it started with "lib/" in an inline monospaced font. This sentence has been modified. (MVNEX-112)
Maven by Example is now available as an epub. (MVNEX-57)
Alexander Pogrebnyak and Ilya Klyuchnikov for submitting numerous bug and typo reports.
